text: Nimage tilidirali; avaru avaninda adagisalikkagi tam'ma hrdayagalannu muccikolluttare. Nimage tilidirali; avaru tam'ma udupugalinda tam'mannu muccikondiruvagalu, avaru guptavagiduva mattu avaru bahiranga padisuva ellavannu avanu aritiruttane. Khanditavagiyu avanu manas'sinaladalliruva visayagalannu ballavanu
